text: The Nordsund Bridge () is a bridge that crosses the Nordsundet strait between the islands of Nordlandet and Gomalandet in the town of Kristiansund which is in Kristiansund Municipality, Møre og Romsdal county, Norway. The bridge is long, and the maximum clearance to the sea is . The bridge carries Norwegian National Road 70. The current bridge replaced an older bridge that was opened on 20 December 1936. The old bridge was a steel arch bridge that was long and had a main span of . ==See also== *List of bridges in Norway *List of bridges in Norway by length *List of bridges *List of bridges by length *Sørsund Bridge ==References== ==External links== *A picture of Kristiansund with both the Nordsund (right) and Sørsund (left) bridges *http://home.no.net/lotsberg/data/norway/bru.html Category:Bridges in Møre og Romsdal Category:Bridges completed in 1936 Category:Buildings and structures in Kristiansund Category:1936 establishments in Norway Category:Norwegian National Road 70
title: Nordsund Bridge (Kristiansund)
